sect1.title: LOG10
sect1.para: Return the base 10 logarithm of the argument.

sect2.title: Returns
sect2.para: Return the base 10 logarithm of the argument, or NaN if the argument is negative

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: make "foo log10 2 ; foo == 0.3010299956639812 make "foo log10 1 ; foo == 0 make "foo log10 10 ; foo == 1 make "foo log10 10000 ; foo == 4 make "foo log10 0 ; foo == -infinity make "foo log10 -1 ; foo == NaN
